result.eng: She had heard the story from her mother who was seventy at that time.
result.ga: Chuala sí an scéal óna máthair a bhí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sin
result.orig: Chuala sí an scéal óna máthair a bhí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sin
result.html: Chuala sí an scéal óna máthair a bhí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sinShe had heard the story from her mother who was seventy at that time.
result.ponchtml: Ċuala sí an scéal óna máṫair a ḃí seasca bliain d'aois um an dtaca sinShe had heard the story from her mother who was seventy at that time.

result.eng: Anyway, to make a long story short...
result.ga: Cibé ar bith le scéal fada a dhéanamh gairid
result.orig: Cibé ar bith le scéal fada a dhéanamh gairid
result.html: Cibé ar bith le scéal fada a dhéanamh gairidAnyway, to make a long story short...
result.ponchtml: Cibé ar biṫ le scéal fada a ḋéanaṁ gairidAnyway, to make a long story short...

result.eng: Listen, did you hear the story?
result.ga: Cogar ar chuala tú an scéal
result.orig: Cogar ar chuala tú an scéal
result.html: Cogar ar chuala tú an scéalListen, did you hear the story?
result.ponchtml: Cogar ar ċuala tú an scéalListen, did you hear the story?

result.html: Inis scéal dúinn a dhaidíTell us a story, daddy.
result.ponchtml: Inis scéal dúinn a ḋaidíTell us a story, daddy.

result.eng: It's a good detective story if the murder happens in the first paragraph.
result.ga: Is maith an scéal bleachtaireachta é ina dtarlaíonn an dúnmharú sa chéad alt
result.orig: Is maith an scéal bleachtaireachta é ina dtarlaíonn an dúnmharú sa chéad alt
result.html: Is maith an scéal bleachtaireachta é ina dtarlaíonn an dúnmharú sa chéad altIt's a good detective story if the murder happens in the first paragraph.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ an scéal bleaċtaireaċta é ina dtarlaíonn an dúnṁarú sa ċéad altIt's a good detective story if the murder happens in the first paragraph.

result.eng: A story about a little girl who goes to the wood.
result.ga: Scéal faoi chailín beag a théann isteach sa choill
result.orig: Scéal faoi chailín beag a théann isteach sa choill
result.html: Scéal faoi chailín beag a théann isteach sa choillA story about a little girl who goes to the wood.
result.ponchtml: Scéal faoi ċailín beag a ṫéann isteaċ sa ċoillA story about a little girl who goes to the wood.

result.eng: That's the end of the story, my friends.
result.ga: Sin deireadh leis an scéal a chairde
result.orig: Sin deireadh leis an scéal a chairde
result.html: Sin deireadh leis an scéal a chairdeThat's the end of the story, my friends.
result.ponchtml: Sin deireaḋ leis an scéal a ċairdeThat's the end of the story, my friends.

result.html: Sin é an scéal uileThat's the whole story.
result.ponchtml: Sin é an scéal uileThat's the whole story.

result.ga: Tá an scéal seo go hiomlán cumtha
result.orig: Tá an scéal seo go hiomlán cumtha
result.html: Tá an scéal seo go hiomlán cumthaThis story is completely fictional.
result.ponchtml: Tá an scéal seo go hiomlán cumṫaThis story is completely fictional.

result.eng: What is special about the story is that you can never be sure of anything.
result.ga: Tá sé de bhua ag an scéal nach féidir bheith cinnte faoi aon rud
result.orig: Tá sé de bhua ag an scéal nach féidir bheith cinnte faoi aon rud
result.html: Tá sé de bhua ag an scéal nach féidir bheith cinnte faoi aon rudWhat is special about the story is that you can never be sure of anything.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé de ḃua ag an scéal naċ féidir ḃeiṫ cinnte faoi aon rudWhat is special about the story is that you can never be sure of anything.

result.eng: I don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.
result.ga: Ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn é
result.orig: Ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn é
result.html: Ní cuimhin liom gach pioc den scéal ach is cuimhin liom gur inis sé go hálainn éI don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.
result.ponchtml: Ní cuiṁin liom gaċ pioc den scéal aċ is cuiṁin liom gur inis sé go hálainn éI don't remember all the details of the story but I do remember that he told it beautifully.

result.eng: But that was not the end of the story.
result.ga: Ach níorbh shin é deireadh an scéil
result.orig: Ach níorbh shin é deireadh an scéil
result.html: Ach níorbh shin é deireadh an scéilBut that was not the end of the story.
result.ponchtml: Aċ níorḃ ẛin é deireaḋ an scéilBut that was not the end of the story.
